name: SpeechGrammarList.item
description: The item getter of the SpeechGrammarList interface is a standard getter — it allows individual SpeechGrammar objects to be retrieved from the SpeechGrammarList using array syntax.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The item getter of the SpeechGrammarList interface is a standard getter — it allows individual SpeechGrammar objects to be retrieved from the SpeechGrammarList using array syntax.
